channel.description: Recent content on Acacess - Let's Make Academia More Accessible

item.title: 8 Things I learn from the failure of a 9-month startup
item.description: Last May, one of my friends approached me to build a startup with him; however, just after 9 months, we claimed bankrupted.

item.title: Digital Tools for Scholars (An Updated Version in 2019)
item.description: Here, at Acacess, we understand the importance using digital tools in academic, so we spent some time cleaning and regrouping these digital services, hoping you can easily find the one you are looking for.
